resources.string: I think I have enough potential to be useful. If you invest in me, I can promise to be the best for you, stay and grow with you.
I using Unity not alot, but having fun when I do games with it. I know how animations works, wath is coliders,
Experience: about 1 year. Madaded games: 4( one fully accsesible in play store
Where You can find all information?
Evrything else you can find in Meniu section

I use Android Studio about 7 months now. Maded some apps witch I can show in interview. Android Studio is strongest my side. And I like it very much. I know what is layouts, adapters, holders, values files and many more. By theway this app was maded with it. \t * Know how to use grandle \t * Know why I need manifest \t * Know about difirent screens compability \t * Now have interested learn use MVVM pattern \t * Thinking switch to Kotlin one day (Now still using Java)
Experiance: about 7 months. Made apps: more than 10 (fully completed)
"I thing you still have questions for me, so you can contact me one of methods below: "

I always have goals that make me move along. It\'s not terrible to me try out new and unknown things. Not only I think about things, but I try to get them done. Strongest developing side - create Android applications using Android Studio IDE.
What I am DOING right now?
In this section you can find some information my experience
In this section you can find some information about me
I am currently studying VIKO EIF Smart Equipment Technologies. In my free time (and not only) learning to develop Android applications.

I am a little slow. I think this is just a matter of time and experience. I have theoretical knowledge about MVVM, MVC and similar templates, but still difficult to implement them. The weakest part of the creation is React Native.

Programing and developing aplications is my hobby, so work where I can do those thing is be a great and meaningful, time-consuming, resourceful and up-to-date resource. I hope to be beneficial and to benefit from what is beneficial to everyone. Therefore, my main goal at the moment is meaningful work, perhaps at your company.
I hope you understand that I\'m not yet a senior programmer, you always can help when you really need it, and let it go ahead with you.
I practice at the IoT Teltonika Academy. Runtime - 270 hours. I have proof of this (certificate).
While studying I had two internships. Language learning was C #. I also have other theoretical materials about programming (design) templates, program memory, object oriented programing and so on.
I Have some experience with Google Play Console, App publishing, Updates.
Have some experience with Google Play Games services, one game fully available in Google Play Store
